text: Awon t’o gbe Ite-ola naa ru ati awon t’o wa ni ayika re, won n se afomo pelu idupe fun Oluwa won. Won gba Allahu gbo. Won si n toro aforijin fun awon t’o gbagbo ni ododo (bayii pe): "Oluwa wa, ike ati imo (Re) gbooro ju gbogbo nnkan lo, nitori naa, saforijin fun awon t’o ronu piwada, ti won si tele oju-ona Re. Ki O si so won ninu iya ina Jehim
